title: Did you get more snow than I did?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/wWtKcJR.jpg

We were estimated to get 5-8 inches, there is approximately 13 inches on that railing.

Bless Michigan weather people, they try but its like trying to guess the lottery numbers.

Anywho how much snow do you guys have?

edit: btw it is 1 â„‰ here.
